p: After the mice were killed by exsanguination, the lungs were removed, homogenized, and centrifuged at 4000× g for 15 min at 4 °C. Before the analysis of cytokine levels, the supernatant of the lung homogenate was stored at − 80 °C. Anti-mouse enzyme-linked immunosorbent assay (ELISA) kits (eBioscience, San Diego, CA, USA) were used to measure the concentrations of interleukin (IL)-6, tumor necrosis factor (TNF)-α and interferon (IFN)-γ in the bronchoalveolar lavage fluid.
